content: these cat butt coasters are a fun way for cat lovers to decorate their home this pattern is easy for any crocheter to follow and it has endless possibilities i personally modeled mine after my best friend s cats but the great thing about this pattern is that you can have these match any cats in your life or you can create any kind of kitty cat your heart desires their primary use is a coaster but they also make a great wall decoration the one s i made for my best friend hang on the wall in her house and they look great
